visual_desc: EXT. FROZEN NORTHERN FOREST - DAY. Chaotic, hand-held medium shot showing <The Wolf> (imposing, scarred face) swinging a colossal, rustic battle axe in wide, savage arcs against arrayed infantry. Beside him, a snarling DIREWOLF lets out a deafening HOWL, dominating the soundscape.
variation_reason: Compared to the first frame, the primary changes are the progression of the savage-looking warrior's axe swing and the continued posture of the Direwolf, which are minor dynamic shifts within an established composition. The camera remains in a chaotic medium shot.
ff_desc: EXT. FROZEN NORTHERN FOREST - DAY. A chaotic, hand-held medium shot. Forest floor is covered in snow and ice. In the foreground, a savage-looking warrior with a scarred face, wearing barbarian furs and wielding a colossal, rustic battle axe, is mid-swing in a wide, savage arc. Beside him, a massive, snarling Direwolf stands ready.
lf_desc: EXT. FROZEN NORTHERN FOREST - DAY. A chaotic, hand-held medium shot. The savage-looking warrior with a scarred face is still mid-swing, his battle axe having completed its arc toward an unseen enemy, positioned against arrayed infantry, partially visible in the background. The massive, snarling Direwolf remains next to him, face raised.
motion_desc: The camera movement is a tight, chaotic, hand-held medium shot that remains essentially static, jostled by the implied action. The savage-looking warrior with a scarred face executes the dynamic movement, swinging a colossal, rustic battle axe in wide, savage arcs toward arrayed infantry situated slightly beyond the immediate foreground. Simultaneously, the massive, snarling animal next to him lets out a deafening HOWL.
audio_desc: [Sound Effect] The DEAFENING HOWL of DIREWOLVES mixes with the impact of steel on wood and bone.
